thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 89 of 3150
thread.title: FN

author: FN
title: FN
text:
We have used Rental Cars four times now - competitve rates plus the benefit of taking out their own comprehensive protection insurance to prevent overcharging by car hire companies at destination.
Only criticism this year is that there are too many obscure local car hire companies included in comparisons. Last year we were offered Firefly over the phone - the price was good but the car and local service was not!
